Name: -1_and_the_to_we
Representative_Docs: ["Having done a great deal of research about New York hotels and prices, we were expecting very little for our money but the Suite at the Setai surpassed all expectations, it was a really good size, with a seperate lounge area, walk in wardrobe and huge bathroom, with a large walk in shower, very large luxurious bath, oh yes and 3 TV's one of which was in the bathroom mirror! Our personal assistant Eugenie was exceptional!, As we were there for a special occasion we had been in contact with Eugenia for a good few weeks prior to our arrival to help us with restaurant recommendations and bookings, as well as other sightseeing and tour information", 'We just returned after a six nights stay in Chicago, our room was on the 16th Floor but unfortunately we did not have a good view, room was a cornor room so was really spacious and very comfortable, Staff were very friendly and helpful, you could hear the sirens from the nearby fire station but the noise didnt bother me and I am a rather light sleeper, Its handy that there was an I phone charger in the room for me to use, Room service was great,The hotel is in a great location for shopping and sight seeing so I would recommend this hotel', 'When we arrived at the hotel we were greeted by the staff with a "welcome to your home for the next 3 nights" This certainly was what the hotel felt like, the service was excellent but the room just felt like we had arrived and was as close to home as you can get when staying in a hotel room']

Name: 0_location_shopping_walk_walking
Representative_Docs: ['Close to great shopping and restaurants this is the place to stay', 'Great location, close to many restaurants and shopping', 'The location is close to Central Park (Walking distance)']

Name: 1_de_et_le_est
Representative_Docs: ["Bonjour, J'ai séjourné dans cette hôtel en aout 2012 , je vous le recommande fortement emplacement et situation geographique parfaite , le servie de l'hôtel est au dessus de la moyenne, un personnel qui est aux petits soins avec la clientèle", "La grande dame de cuivre, les grattes-ciels aux muscles d'acier, Central Park, vous m'avez reconnu : New York la cosmopolite, la foisonnante, la passionnante ! Logés au Chatwal sur la 44e rue entre la sixième et septième avenue, une adresse de choix : merci à Christine pour son accueil, et à Michael pour tous les petits services qui facilitent le quotidien dans un tel hôtel ! Un cadre frais et reposant dans une ville tourbillonnante ! Hôtel dans le style art déco qui va si bien à New York !", "Pou commencer L'hotel est bien place a deux pas du beverly center La deco signe starck ressemble plus a son show room qu a un interieur amenage par un createur La suite est grande et belle le personnel de chambre est serviable et souriant un bon point ! Le petit dejeuner est cher et peu copieux le buffet remplis a peine une petite table La piscine est mal amenage on peut se retrouver nez a nez face a face avec d autre client de l hotel pas forcement agreable De plus la piscine ne dispose pas de douche ce qui peut expliquer la couleur de l eau pleine d'huile solaire Service voiturier et parking tres efficace tout comme le concierge Donc un bon hotel mais trop cher pour ses prestations et sa petite piscine"]

Name: 23_el_que_de_en
Representative_Docs: ['El desayuno es muy variado,la calidad de todos los productos es exquisita y fresca; la atención es excelente en este lugar y en el bar, donde nos atendio una camarera que habla perfecto español y nos sugirió lugares divinos para conocer y cenar! Aunque si no tienen ganas de salir, en el mismo hotel ofrecen cena y siempre hay musica en vivo como jazz los fines de semana', '¿Que decir sobre The Plaza Hotel que ya no se haya dicho? Es cierto todo lo expresado acerca de su ubicacion; la calidad del servicio; el profesionalismo de todo el personal desde el primero al ultimo, y los detalles de lujo en las habitaciones y particularmente en los baños', 'Las habitaciones son muy amplias, la que nos tocó tenía una vista preciosa al lago Michigan, pero el baño podría ser más moderno y lo que verdaderamente nos molestó mucho durante toda nuestra estancia fue que olía a cigarro, nosotros desde que reservamos pedimos específicamente habitación de no fumadores, y supuestamente no solo la habitación era de no fumadores, sino que estaba en un piso de no fumadores, sin embargo cada vez que abríamos la puerta de nuestro cuarto, nos llegaba el tufazo a colillas viejas de cigarro, a lo mejor es porque aunque limpien a conciencia, como las alfombras y las cortinas son viejas, ya no se les quita el olor ni lavándolas']

Representative_Docs: ['We already had all of our dinner and show reservations but heard from other guests that the Plaza concierge were able to get them into some very popular restaurants last minute', 'They were able to get me and my husband reservations at any restaurant with a quick call', 'They were able to get us dinner reservations on a Saturday night and answered any question about what to do and see']

Name: 96_peninsula_3x_oue_cheep
Representative_Docs: ['Highly recommend the Peninsula, you will not be disappointed', 'Our stay at the Peninsula met all my expectations', '(See Peninsula review']

Name: 97_stayed_days_here_adams
Representative_Docs: ['Stayed here for two days and loved it', 'I stayed here for three days', 'Stayed here for two days and had a great time']

Name: 98_desk_front_told_said
Representative_Docs: ['We called down to the front desk and were told they would get back to us momentarily', 'Heading over to the front desk there were a couple people in front of us but they promptly called out another front desk agent to help', 'Even though we went to the front desk and told them we were leaving the staff didn’t check us out of our room']

Name: 99_service_fs_hotel_this
Representative_Docs: ['Beyond the luxurious amenities and sheets one would expect, what I really enjoyed about this hotel in particular was the incredibly personalized service', 'Kudos to Lema and the general management of this hotel for exemplary customer service', "It's not the glitziest FS but it's just a great place with consistently excellent customer service, year in an year out"]

Name: 100_tip_tipping_accept_gratuity
Representative_Docs: ['We had our butler bring us ice once and he would not accept a tip', "I also love that they dont accept tips - not because I don't want to tip - believe me I've tried", 'Of course each time there was the expectation for a tip (a stark contrast to my previous stay at the Waldorf where there is a no tipping policy - heavenly!) The housekeeping was very inconsistent -- some times turndown service was impeccable with a fresh bottle of water and my slippers laid neatly by the bed, other times my slippers would be scattered somewhere and no water bottle in sight']

Name: 101_she_standing_health_her
Representative_Docs: ['However, she was insistent that she organise something for me and made me feel like it really was not an issue at all', "She informed us that our room wasn't ready and if we wanted to wait at the bar or the rooftop lounge she would find us when it was available", 'She actually tidied up and straightened our wayward shoes, she laid all of our loose toiletries on a towel, and she folded a pair of pants that had fallen off of a chair back, absolutely nothing invasive, just really thoughtful attentiveness']

Name: 102_name_names_by_knew
Representative_Docs: ['They greeted us by name everywhere we went', 'The staff made it there business to learn our name and we were always addressed by our last name until the day we left', 'On top of all those lovely touches, everyone addresses you by your last name as though you are a permanent resident, and addressed my daughter by her first name']

Name: 103_drawers_desk_closet_couch
Representative_Docs: ['Very spacious 420 sq ft room, huge comfortable bed, large flat screen tv, Nespresso coffee machine, microwave, large work desk area, large couch', 'There are two drawers in each nighhtstand, along with cordless phones on each side, a nice clock, dimmer switch lights on the lamps, as well as convenient outlets to charge phones on each side', 'The Superior room has a king size bed, a good size office desk and chair, a full 3 seater couch(!!), a changing / dressing area with a closet and drawers to put clothing away, and a wonderful marble filled bathroom with separate tub, shower, and toilet enclosure']

Name: 104_nights_august_spent_during
Representative_Docs: ['Just spent three nights at this hotel this week (8/13/2012)', 'My husband and I stayed in this hotel for 5 nights in August, during a busy time', 'I spent two nights during the week in August at this hotel']

Name: 105_issues_minor_few_complain
Representative_Docs: ['We had a few minor issues during our stay and all were quickly corrected', 'On the downside we had a few minor issues', 'The issues we had were minor']
